explains: n. 达到，获得；成就，造诣

sentences.en: Although children of Mexican immigrants do better, in terms of educational and professional attainment than their parents, UCLA sociologist Edward Telles has found that the gains don't continue.
sentences.cn: 尽管墨西哥移民的孩子在教育和职业成就方面比他们的父母做得更好，加州大学洛杉矶分校的社会学家爱德华·特勒斯发现这种增长不会持续下去。

sentences.en: The attainment of his ambitions was still a dream.
sentences.cn: 他要实现的抱负仍然是一个梦想。

sentences.en: The attainment of happiness becomes the ultimate or highest good for Aristotle.
sentences.cn: 对亚里士多德来说，获得幸福成为了终极的或最高形式的善。
